extensionDescription.message: A powerful tab manager to save and organize your browser tabs into collections

extensionDefaultTitle.description: Default title shown on extension icon hover

commandDescription.description: Description of the keyboard shortcut command

aiSuggestionsWhat.message: What is it: When you save open tabs as a new collection, we can use AI to automatically analyze the pages and suggest an appropriate name and description for the collection.
aiSuggestionsWhat.description: Explanation of what AI suggestions feature does

aiSuggestionsWhy.message: Why it's useful: This will save you time on manually naming each new collection and help maintain a neatly organized workspace with smart, descriptive titles.
aiSuggestionsWhy.description: Explanation of why AI suggestions are useful
